subject: General Hindi
topic: Vakyaansh ke liye ek Sarthak Shabd (One Word Substitution)
question_en: What is the national bird of India?
question_hi: भारतीय नागरिक अंग्रेज़ी कैसे कहा जाता है ?
explanation_en: The national bird of India is the eagle. In Hindi, it is referred to as 'इंडीज़' (I-ndi-jeez).
explanation_hi: भारतीय राष्ट्रीय पेच्छ (Pechch) किस्तान के नागरीय रूप को कहा जाता है। हिंदी में, इसे 'इंडीज़' (I-ndi-jeez) कहा जाता है।

subject: General Hindi
topic: Vakyaansh ke liye ek Sarthak Shabd (One Word Substitution)
question_en: Which is the national bird of Bangladesh?
question_hi: बंगाबाद के नागरीय पेच्छ (Bangabhumi ki nagariya peechch) kis ka hai?
explanation_en: The national bird of Bangladesh is the kite (Kite) in Hindi, which is represented as 'किट (Kiit)'.
explanation_hi: बंगाबाद ke nagariya peechch Bangladesh ke nagariya peechch hai, jahan 'किट (Kiit)' है, जिन्हाव (Hawaw) ही बीज़ (Beejis) ka matlab nahi hai।

subject: General Hindi
topic: Vakyaansh ke liye ek Sarthak Shabd (One Word Substitution)
question_en: What is the national bird of Pakistan?
question_hi: पाकिस्तान के नागरीय पेच्च (Paksistan ke nagariya peechch hai)
explanation_en: The national bird of Pakistan is the hawk (Hawaw).
explanation_hi: पाकिस्तान के नागरीय पेच्च होंगाव (Paksistan ke nagariya peechch honge hawaw)

subject: General Hindi
topic: Vakyaansh ke liye ek Sarthak Shabd (One Word Substitution)
question_en: What is the national bird of Sri Lanka?
question_hi: स्रोतान के नागरीय पेच्च (Srilanka ke nagariya peechch hai)
explanation_en: The national bird of Sri Lanka is the peafowl (Peafowl).
explanation_hi: स्रोतान के नागरीय पेफाव (Srilanka ke nagariya peechch hai)

subject: General Hindi
topic: Vakyaansh ke liye ek Sarthak Shabd (One Word Substitution)
question_en: What is the national bird of Bangladesh?
explanation_en: The national bird of Bangladesh is the kite (Kite).
